pageContent: Purpose: To investigate diagnostic accuracy of detection of prostate cancer by magnetic resonance: to evaluate the performance of T2WI, DCEMRI and CSI and to correlate the results with biopsy and radical prostatectomy histopathological data.

metaData.source:
The relative importance of anatomic and PSA factors to outcomes after radical prostatectomy for prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/11764075/
